definition: to load sth onto a ship etc
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: One copy of inspection Report on Quantity and Quality issued SGS at loading port.
sentences.chinese: 裝貨港SGS數量及重量檢驗報告，一份副本。

sentences.english: We would have some water in our loading dock in the back.
sentences.chinese: 我們本來在我們的碼頭裝貨水在後面。

sentences.english: Expanded opportunity of loading M3U playlists.
sentences.chinese: 擴大機會裝貨m3u播放清單。

sentences.english: One necessary aspect of bulk cargo is fungibility .
sentences.chinese: 散裝貨所必須具備的一個特徵是它的替換性。

sentences.english: When does your cargo liner sail?
sentences.chinese: 你們的裝貨班輪什麼時候開航？

sentences.english: This watch may be a counterfeit, but it looks just like the original.
sentences.chinese: 這隻手錶有可能是假貨，但它看起來很像原裝貨。

sentences.english: The ship stopped here to take in freight.
sentences.chinese: 這艘船在這裏停泊裝貨。

sentences.english: Please calculate the loading scale and the number of containers of their shift.
sentences.chinese: 請計算一下本班的裝貨水尺和集裝箱箱數。

sentences.english: Does a W. P. A. policy include a deck loading stipulation?
sentences.chinese: 水漬險是否包括甲板上裝貨的規定？

sentences.english: Cover bilge(s) with wrapper before loading.
sentences.chinese: 在裝貨前艙底污水井用包裝布蓋上。

sentences.english: Vessel sailed from loading port to yingkou port directly . without discharging any cargo on the voyage.
sentences.chinese: 船舶由裝貨港直達營口港，中途未卸貨。

sentences.english: We'll pick out the damaged cargo in the slings during loading, provided there is any.
sentences.chinese: 裝貨過程中我們會撿出關內殘損貨，如果有的話。

sentences.english: Payment shall be made CWO by means of T/TorM/T.
sentences.chinese: 裝貨付款費用應以電匯或信匯的方式。

sentences.english: I had to wait most of the day to deliver the bales, sitting there in my truck, watching stevedores load other cargo.
sentences.chinese: 我幾乎等了整整一天，坐在卡車裏看着碼頭工人裝貨。

sentences.english: I am afraid the cartons are not strong enough.
sentences.chinese: 我擔心裝貨的紙箱不夠結實。

sentences.english: Please tell the Foremen keep the vessel level during loading.
sentences.chinese: 告訴單船指導員裝貨時候保持船體平衡。
